description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nMaster of Cataclysms:
If all the creatures in your party are {RACE_Cataclysm}s, their traits have a 10% chance to activate at the start of each creatures' turn as well. This trait does not stack.
name: Sigil of the Cataclysm
